entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
